subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Racing boards in New York and in Kentucky have taken steps to exclude from racing a horse owned by Ramzan A. Kadyrov, whose rule, international critics say, has been marked by abductions and torture.
snippet: Racing boards in New York and in Kentucky have taken steps to exclude from racing a horse owned by Ramzan A. Kadyrov, whose rule, international critics say, has been marked by abductions and torture.
